title: Game crash after champ select (mac) please help!
body:
I cant play after champ select as it crashes and if I right click the application it says application not responding and so i quit it and restart league and *try* to reconnect but it crashes and forces my client to the end game screen and i cant get back into the game 
What do i do? wait? 
Thank you
{{champion:32}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Crashes in the mac client are almost always caused by an unstable connection to the server. This could be a result of local network settings or a routing issue to the server. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as a first step.

Let me know if that guide caused any change in your crashes.
